items.sentence: That\'s the most important thing to remember.
Tom and his father are building a tree house.
She asked him if he knew my telephone number.
There used to be a small castle on this hill.
Tom might be able to do that, but I doubt it.
Tom must be busier now than he was last year.
Tom never told me that you were so beautiful.
I didn\'t know Tom was younger than you were.
I didn\'t know that Tom was going to do that.
I didn\'t know that Tom was younger than you.
I don\'t have to tell you what this is, do I?
I don\'t know if Tom plans to do that or not.
Everybody laughed at the way Tom was dancing.
Most of the students already understand this.
You have no idea how important you are to me.
You need to turn yourselves in to the police.
You should stay in Boston for a couple weeks.
You should take an umbrella in case it rains.
Tom has a wife and three children to support.
Tom has been battling cancer for three years.
Do you really think Tom might still be alive?
Do you really want to learn another language?
Does Tom really want me to come to his party?
Does Tom want me to drive him to the airport?
I should\'ve asked Tom when I had the chance.
I don\'t know what you\'re complaining about.
I don\'t know what\'s going to happen to you.
I don\'t know when I\'ll be able to help you.
What Tom predicted would happen has happened.
Do all of you think that this is a good idea?
Actually, I didn\'t want to ask you anything.
Don\'t forget to fill the tank with gasoline.
Don\'t forget to wake me up tomorrow morning.
Don\'t give Tom more money than is necessary.
Don\'t hesitate to ask if you need something.
Tom has three extra tickets he wants to sell.
Tom has very few photos of himself as a baby.
I told Mary that I just wanted to be friends.
You\'re the nicest girlfriend I\'ve ever had.
Tom asked me if I would be home this evening.
Tom asked me to wait here until he came back.
I assume you don\'t want go swimming with us.
Even though Mary is fat, she\'s quite pretty.
Every time I see Tom, he\'s eating something.
There\'s someone I have to contact in Boston.
They\'re going to demolish that old building.
This box is very heavy, so I can\'t carry it.
Tom served 30 years for second degree murder.
Tom spent the afternoon handing out leaflets.
Tom told me I should get myself a girlfriend.
